ch.epfl.lis.gnw
Class Gene

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lis.networks.Node
      ch.epfl.lis.gnw.Gene
Direct Known Subclasses:
HillGene
public abstract class Gene
extends ch.epfl.lis.networks.Node

A gene is a node of a gene network. It contains the gene parameters that are independent of the regulation function. These parameters are the maximum transcription and translation rates, and the mRNA and protein degradation rates. This class allows to compute the production rate and to randomly initialize the dynamical model of the gene. Different models of gene regulation could be implemented in subclasses of Gene. For now, only HillGene is implemented.

Author:
Daniel Marbach (firstname.name@gmail.com), Thomas Schaffter (firstname.name@gmail.com)
